title: Historic Studio Retreat with Modern Eco-Touches in Jeżyce
description: Step into Poznan history with this beautifully-restored studio apartment tucked within a classic Jeżyce tenement. Boasting original parquet flooring and soaring ceilings, the airy space seamlessly blends old-world charm with contemporary eco-friendly upgrades. The open-plan design ensures natural light throughout, while a modern bathroom provides everyday comfort.
neighborhood_description: Situated in sought-after Jeżyce, the studio is surrounded by cafés, vibrant local markets, and leafy urban parks. This bike- and family-friendly neighborhood is renowned for excellent public transport links and its proximity to Poznan’s bustling city center, offering both peace and convenience.
target_buyer: Ideal for young families seeking authentic local character and green features in a child-friendly urban environment.
market_positioning: This competitively priced studio stands out for its blend of period architecture, green innovations, and unbeatable Jeżyce location, making it a rare find in Poznan's busy market.
